You can tell the writer is an amateur when they let scenes go on for way too fucking long. The main girl’s backstory is sooooo looooong, when we went back too the main guy, I had forgotten he existed. Also, it’s super melodramatic. You can hear the fucking writer pounding away at the keys like, “uuuuuuuhh~, so tragic, I’m a genius.”
